description: Nicknamed Bel or "Prince the Ripper", is considered to be the "genius" of the Varia, displaying both combat and tactical skills whose choice of weapons are knives and wires. Rooting from a royal family, Bel is said to have murdered his twin brother, Rasiel, when he was young after mistaking him for a cockroach, and that upon seeing his own blood, Bel`s power surges because it reminds him of the thrill of killing his brother.
name: Belphegor
